sentences.en: Article 4 The division and alteration of the pilotage districts shall be stipulated by MOTC.
sentences.cn: 第4条(引水区域之划分变更)引水区域之划分或变更,由交通部定之.

sentences.en: Compulsory pilotage, but no port communication station.
sentences.cn: 强制引航，但没有港口通讯电台。

sentences.en: Not compulsory pilotage, but get the best pilot the ship to help the pilot with navigation station contact Mercedes Kong.
sentences.cn: 不强制引航，但大船最好获得领航员的帮助，引航可与梅塞德斯港领航站联系。

sentences.en: Pilotage is compulsory in Hong Kong waters.
sentences.cn: 领航在香港水域是强制性的.

sentences.en: Since this year, shanghai harbor pilotage stands.
sentences.cn: 今年以来, 上海港引航站.

sentences.en: The enforcement of compulsory pilotage shall be stipulated by MOTC by order.
sentences.cn: 强制引水之实施,由交通部以命令定之.

sentences.en: There are 83 licensed pilots who provide pilotage services through a private company.
sentences.cn: 本港现有83名持有执照的领港员,透过一家私人公司提供领航服务.

words.tran_cn: 领港；近岸航行法；地标领航；半工厂性检查
领航；[水运]领港费；驾驶术；领航费

trans.tran_en: the act of piloting an aircraft or ship
